tip: Drink a glass of water first thing in the morning to kickstart hydration
Eat the rainbow - include fruits and vegetables of different colors daily

Use herbs and spices instead of salt to reduce sodium intake
Include protein in every meal to maintain energy levels throughout the day
Take the stairs whenever possible to add movement to your day
Stand up and stretch every 30 minutes if you have a desk job
Try 5-minute 'exercise snacks' throughout the day instead of one long workout
Park farther away to add extra walking steps to your routine
Incorporate strength training 2-3 times per week for bone health
Practice 5 minutes of deep breathing daily to reduce stress
Keep a gratitude journal - write 3 positive things each day
Create a consistent bedtime routine for better sleep quality
Avoid screens 30 minutes before bed to improve sleep
Laugh daily - it reduces stress hormones and boosts immunity
Wash hands for 20 seconds with soap to prevent illness
Use sunscreen daily, even on cloudy days
Floss daily to reduce gum disease risk and support heart health
Drink water throughout the day, not just when thirsty
Practice good posture - align ears, shoulders, and hips when sitting
Get annual check-ups even when feeling healthy
Know your family medical history for better preventive care
Wear proper footwear that supports your arches and activities
Get vaccinated according to recommended schedules
Practice safe lifting techniques - bend knees, not back
Take regular breaks from prolonged sitting or standing
Maintain social connections for mental and emotional wellbeing
Learn to recognize and manage stress triggers effectively
Practice mindful eating without distractions like TV or phones
Get 7-9 hours of quality sleep each night for optimal health
